examples.chinese: A公司的最新廣告，搞了一個大烏龍!
examples.translation: Company A's latest commercial was a total screw-up!

examples.chinese: 最後警方到場，才發現整件事情全是烏龍一場！
examples.translation: When the police finally arrived, they discovered the whole thing was just a big blunder!

sourceEnglish: goof up, screw up, make a blunder
